document.full_text: with weeks to go before the flood waters of the crested mississippi river fully recede, officials in vicksburg, mississippi, are advising caution and preparing for an aggressive cleanup.
document.title: vicksburg officials urge caution, plan for cleanup
lines_and_colors: with weeks to go before the flood waters of the crested mississippi river fully recede, officials in vicksburg, mississippi, are advising caution and preparing for an aggressive cleanup.
